Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: University lecturers or teachers are very distant to their students which encourages usage of tools like AI. Thus, on the rare occasion I need something explained to me ‘better’ I may resort to AI with skepticism of course. And even then I don’t trust it, which leads to a very unclear idea of what we’re meant to learn or do.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Lost, University courses (made by teachers) are very unclear and abstract about their feedback.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Gen AI it’s part much useless in identifying anything as it hallucinates and critiques pretty much nothing.
